definition: The definition of "Inhalt" refers to the substance or material contained within something, often referring to the content of a written work, such as a book, article, or document. It is commonly used to describe the information, ideas, or topics covered within a specific piece of writing.

examples.german: Der Inhalt der Flasche ist giftig.
examples.english: The content of the bottle is toxic.

examples.german: Bitte überprüfen Sie den Inhalt des Pakets.
examples.english: Please check the contents of the package.

examples.german: Der Inhalt der Vorlesung war sehr interessant.
examples.english: The content of the lecture was very interesting.

examples.german: Die Website hat einen neuen Inhalt.
Der Inhalt des Buches hat mich berührt.
examples.english: The content of the book touched me.
